title: Fury-Wilder 3 possible for October - Warren
description: British world heavyweight champion Tyson Fury could fight American Deontay Wilder for a third time in October, says promoter Frank Warren.

'Listen to Boris, stay indoors' - Fury shares coronavirus advice
British world heavyweight champion Tyson Fury could fight American Deontay Wilder for a third time in October, says promoter Frank Warren.
